# Lumière Award for Best Director

}}
The Lumière Award for Best Director () is an award presented annually by the Académie des Lumières since 1996. It was presented as the Lumière du meilleur réalisateur from 1996 to 2019.
Winners and nominees
Winners are listed first with a blue background, followed by the other nominees.
